ComicInfo.Summary:
Nazi werewolves plan to detonate a nuclear device in New York and bring the world to its knees! The Eternal Warrior must locate and disarm the bombs before it is too late. Can he save this world or will another be rebuilt from the ashes?
1995 books with a UPC code may exist as "Newsstand Sales" in addition to "Direct Sales".
1st appearance:
- Fenris (Fenris League)
